main event: Four draftspeople observed four bright objects moving rapidly across the sky in Bellflower, California on April 24, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were about the size of a silver dollar., The two trailing objects appeared to be 'tailing' the first two., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., The objects were moving at speeds between 30 and 60 miles per hour., There were six similar sightings reported in the local area at that time.
sighted object: four bright objects in the sky
witness description: draftspeople working late in an office
